title: Create a budget center record
content:
1. From the main menu, select Run > Financials > Budget Centers. The Budget Centers page is displayed.

  2. Click New.

  3. In the New Budget center dialog box, provide all requested information. This dialog box requests values for the basic attributes.

    Field Description
    Title External (common) name of the budget center.
    Description Description that captures the details of the budget center.
    Parent Parent of the budget center.
    Code Internal code for the budget center.

  4. Click Save.

    Alternatively, you can click Save & add another to add another budget center record, or click Save & Edit to continue editing the current budget center record.
